data.title: Local current time of Guwahati, Assam, India, Asia
data.meta_description: Find the current and exact local time of Guwahati, Assam, India, Asia, the sunrise and sunset time and the corresponding time zone.
data.text:
What is the time zone of Guwahati, Assam? The answer is Asia/Kolkata.

The current time of Guwahati, Assam has a difference of 5.5 hours compared to the Greenwich Mean Time zone (GMT) at a longitude of 0 degree.

Geographical coordinates of the city (Guwahati)

Latitude: 26.1844

Longitude: 91.7458

Sun relative's information

The following informations are estimates of the appearance and disappearance of the upper edge or upper limb of the Sun circle. They are based on the sunrise and sunset of the time zone's geographical coordinates. As the land is not always regular, it's practically impossible to get the exact time of the viewer's sun vision.

Sunrise

The sun will rise at 04:53:30
